templates.name: Before/After Split Screen
templates.pattern: Visual: Side-by-side transformation in first 3 seconds
examples: 90 days. Same person. What changed?
Lost 47 pounds in 90 days
From broke to $10k/month in 6 months
tips: Keep text minimal - let visuals speak

templates.name: Contrarian Statement
templates.pattern: Visual: Direct to camera + Caption: Contrarian claim
examples: Cardio is keeping you fat. Here's why...
College is the biggest scam in America
What if everything you know about [X] is wrong?
Stop doing [popular thing] - it's killing your results
tips: Don't be contrarian just for shock value

templates.name: Rapid Results Promise
templates.description: Promise specific outcome in specific timeframe
examples: Lose your first 10 lbs in 14 days (guaranteed)
Make your first $1,000 online in 30 days
Learn Spanish in 90 days - or your money back
tips: Back it up in the body

templates.name: Problem Agitation
templates.pattern: Visual: Frustrated person + Caption: Painful question
examples: Tried keto, paleo, IF... Still stuck at 180?
Working 60 hours and still broke?
Tired of starting over every Monday?
Another New Year's resolution failed?

templates.name: Social Proof Avalanche
templates.pattern: Visual: Grid of results + Caption: Big numbers
examples: 2,847 transformations. You're next.
10,000+ students, $15M+ earned
47,000 people can't be wrong
Join 12,500 others who already transformed

templates.name: Curiosity Gap
templates.description: Create information gap that must be closed
templates.pattern: Visual: Mysterious setup + Caption: Incomplete information
examples: The one food keeping you fat (it's not what you think)
I discovered this by accident and everything changed
This weird trick helped me lose 40 pounds
What doctors don't tell you about [X]

templates.name: Relatable Moment
templates.description: Show a moment everyone has experienced
templates.pattern: Visual: Relatable scenario + Caption: 'You know that feeling when...'
examples: You know that feeling when nothing fits anymore?
That moment you check your bank account and...
When you realize you've wasted another year...
That sinking feeling every Sunday night...

templates.name: Pattern Interrupt
templates.description: Do something unexpected to stop the scroll
templates.pattern: Visual: Unexpected action + Caption: Question or statement
examples: I threw away my scale and lost 50 pounds
I eat 5 meals a day and never count calories
Watch me break every rule in the book
This shouldn't work but it does
